title: WarpTensorImageMultiTransform
description: WarpTensorImageMultiTransform is used to apply transformations including affine and deformation fields to an image, supporting various interpolation techniques, image header reslicing, and compatibility with ANTS-generated transformations.

moving_image.title: Moving Image
moving_image.description: The moving image that will be transformed.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: Path for saving the transformed output image.

reference_image.title: Reference Image
reference_image.description: Reference image for reslicing or defining the transformation domain.

tightest_bounding_box.title: Tightest Bounding Box
tightest_bounding_box.description: Compute the tightest bounding box using all affine transformations.

reslice_by_header.title: Reslice by Header
reslice_by_header.description: Use the orientation matrix and origin encoded in the image file header for reslicing.

use_nearest_neighbor.title: Use Nearest Neighbor Interpolation
use_nearest_neighbor.description: Use Nearest Neighbor Interpolator for the transformation.

transforms.title: Transforms
transforms.description: List of transformations to apply, which can include deformation fields or affine transforms.

ants_prefix.title: ANTS Prefix
ants_prefix.description: Prefix for ANTS-generated deformation and affine transformation files.

ants_prefix_invert.title: ANTS Prefix Invert
ants_prefix_invert.description: Prefix for inverting ANTS-generated affine and deformation transformations.
